#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
 
int main()
{
    char num1[10],num2[10];
    int n1,n2,carry,car,l1,l2,total;
 
    scanf("%s %s",num1,num2);
 
    while(!(num1[0]=='0'&&num2[0]=='0'))
    {
        l1 = strlen(num1) - 1;
        l2 = strlen(num2) - 1;
        car = 0;
        carry = 0;
        while(!(l1==-1||l2==-1))
        {
            n1 = num1[l1] - '0';
            n2 = num2[l2] - '0';
            total = n1 + n2 + carry;
            if(total > 9)
            {
                carry = 1;
                car++;
            }
            else
            {
                carry = 0;
            }
            l1--;
            l2--;
        }
 
        if(car>1)
        {
            printf("%d carry operations.\n",car);
        }
        else
        {
            if(car == 1)
            {
                printf("1 carry operation.\n");
            }
            else
            {
                printf("No carry operation.\n");
            }
        }
 
        scanf("%s %s",num1,num2);
    }
    return 0;
}
